content.detailedDescription: I was about a block away from cos college at a friends house.I noticed this bright ball moving across the sky  and at a steady pace also followed by another one about 300 yards apart.I had no idea what it was.The obejects were bright orange with a little red to them.Both seemed to be moving at slower speed than normal aircraft.I really didnt think much of it until i searched the web to see if anybody else had seen them.Thats when i found that somebody had seen the similar objects on may 1st in the same area over the college.I lost sight as it went pass the treeline in the distance.
content.summary: Round glowing object with no blinking safety lights like a airplane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving on i-84e to go to the portland airport when we saw 11 or 12 glowing yellow spheres in a formation in the sky to the left of the car.  at first i thought they might be planes coming into the airport, but after a few moments it was obvious they were something else.  they didn't seem to move like helicopters or any planes i could think of.  for the next few minutes we peered out the windows as we drove and watched the lights slowly drift from the north to the south in a chain that drifted closer and farther from each other.  they also seemed to get brighter and dimmer, though i wouldn't exactly say they were flickering.  eventually as we merged onto 205 the lights grew dim as they headed south and soon after merging they disappeared altogether.  whether they disappeared rapidly or we just lost sight of them is hard to say.  

honestly, at first we just sort of shrugged it off as something odd, but not too strange, but when we got home we happened to glance at the portland monthly and saw a report of exactly the same thing in the same neighborhood on march 9, 2012.  that was also what led us to mufon.
content.summary: 11-12 orbs hovering in the sky over se portland

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: This started about two weeks ago the first i sar the object it was just dancing around the sky. the second time there were two they would dance in different directions and occasionally come close together ans thes shoot off in different directions.  tonight i decided to check to see if they were back and i saw two this time one seemed to follow me when i moved in the yard to get a chair then it came right over me and stayed there for some time.  the other one seemed to stay a good distance away but did move around a good while.  i need to know if this is real or if i am completely loosing it.  i need help to decide.  thanks.   this dwfinately was not a plane oe hekicopter.  just want someone to tell me what theyn are.
content.summary: Distant- changed directions.Often- flashtd with green and red ocasionally-

content.detailedDescription: Standing out front of house, im very experienced in stars and planets and this did not look like either. i felt a connection with the object. the object was high in the sky and over the 20 min that i watched it it dropped slowly below the houses in my neighborhood.
content.summary: Standing outside of house, and saw a brilliant light in south east sky.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting on her back deck at around 10:00-10:15pm on may 4th, 2012. we were opening up her hot tub when i had noticed a bright light in the sky that was initially stationary, i pointed it out because it looked like a beautiful bright star until it began to get brighter then began moving. i immediately had my friend (fellow witness) look up to make sure what i was seeing was not just a star and that it was actually moving. we both noticed a more triangular shape to the bright light as it began to move faster as if descending from a very high altitude slowly while moving through the night sky. we both pointed out that it was not a plane because there were a few planes moving through the night sky as well with the usual airplane lights and size, however this object seemed to be about 4 times the size of a commercial airliner when observed from the ground.We both tryed to capture it on video with our cell phones but when we tried getting it on our cell phone cameras nothing appeared in the sky. i am not sure what exactly this was, i am not saying it was an alien space ship, nor am i saying it was something of our own technology, it was very strange, i know what planes look like, i myself can not figure out what this was but it was nothing that i have ever seen before.
content.summary: Triangle shaped light hovering then moving slowly, then faster, airplane was in sky, could distinguish easily between them.

content.detailedDescription: My friend manule and his two sons, 11 and 9 years and myself where taking a fishing trip to willow beach arizona when in front of us we saw this cigar real silverie shape object. manule said that it was a military plain and i said oh yeah! wheres i restarted it right away. we left
content.summary: Silver cigar shap-very large

content.detailedDescription: My friend manule and his two sons, 11 and 9 years and myself where taking a fishing trip to willow beach arizona when in front of us we saw this cigar real silverie shape object. manule said that it was a military plain and i said oh yeah! wheres i restarted it right away. we left
content.summary: Silver cigar shap-very large

content.detailedDescription: My friend manule and his two sons, 11 and 9 years and myself where taking a fishing trip to willow beach arizona when in front of us we saw this cigar real silverie shape object. manule said that it was a military plain and i said oh yeah! wheres i restarted it right away. we left
content.summary: Silver cigar shap-very large

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of 2 may 2012, at 9:00 p.M., i went outside to view a thunderstorm building to the north and west of adams, nebraska. while looking north i noticed a red light at approximately 40 degrees above the horizon. it would be about the size of an aspirin held at arms length. the light was moving to the north, the light gradually changed color and became more orange. it then changed direction and made a complete 360 degree turn, winding up moving north again. at this point it was yellow in color. the light then disappeared behind the wall cloud. the light was visible for approximately 5 minutes. i did not hear any sound, this is likely due to the distance and the weather conditions. 
i am former military and can say that i have never seen anything quite like this before. it is possible that this was ball lightning, i have never seen ball lightning before, however this seems like a long duration for that explanation.
content.summary: I observed a light that changed from red, then orange, then yellow.

content.detailedDescription:
I had fallen asleep on my bed with my curtains open, i woke at twenty minutes past midnight and almost immediately noticed a bright flickering light in the sky i lay and watched it for about fifteen minutes even getting my camera which unfortunately had a flat battery.

the light was white with a brighter yellow spot that was sending out small beams of light intermittedly in all directions, then it would stop for a couple of seconds and do the same thing again.

i got out of bed opened the window and carried on watching, i then noticed to my left another identical flickering light doing exactly the same thing and realised that when one had finished the other would shoot the lights out, some beams of light were arc shaped, it was amazing to watch. they were communicating with each other.

i decided to message my sister on facebook who lives half a mile away to look outside because she is usually awake at the time, but unfortunately she didnt reply.

after i had sent this message and looked out the lights were gone.

its the first time i have ever seen anything like this and i went on youtube typing flashing lights in sky and immediately saw something that was just like my sightings, im so lucky to have witnessed this.
content.summary: Two flickering bright lights communicating with each other by sending out beams of lights in all directions

content.detailedDescription:
This morning i left my home to catch the 4:15 am train towards brooklyn. i have been doing this same route almost 12 years this coming november 2012. i rode the 6 train down to brooklyn bridge. i sat on the first car by the doors of the train where people can change from car to car. the train ride itself was of no event. it was smooth, good, i prayed, chanted om, listened to a meditation cd on my iphone, i ate a zone bar, and balanced my check book. the train arrived to brooklyn bridge stop. i got out and walked towards the plat form across and made a left to walk upwards towards the middle back of the pending on coming train  4 or 5 towards atlantic ave station. due to the fact the stairs to get out are towards the back at this time, then off to star bucks for a cappuccino. the sign said 4 train in 13 minutes. there was nothing unusual about anything. i seen some people still sitting on the 6 train and wondered why they did not get out, it was the last stop. usually the conductor gets everyone off. but no conductor and people were just sitting. 

i lean up against a rail by the steps, and lean my back against the handrails, my right body leaned up against the steal larger bar from floor to ceiling. i observe a man across on the up town side of the tracks, homeless, older gentlemen, i think, "poor guy, all these years of mental illness ( the field i work in) and still this man has no help. so, i see another man, checking me out. i look at him, he is wearing shorts, carrying a large duffel bag. i look back again, and still all the passengers are sitting waiting for the same train-down town brooklyn 4 or 5 train.
i lean my head against the steel beam while i look, observe, and then closed my eyes and began to chant om to the music. i hear the train coming, i look up number 4. all the people behind me get up and enter the train. i feel relieved, its here on my way to work, coffee, get notes and paper work done. 

i get on the train, and i walk and find a seat. then i am lost when i look up i see i am at the astor train stop. i am confused, i become scared, i can't understand why, how, did i get on the 6 train up town to the bronx. conductor says "next stop 14 street union sq". now i say wait, "how did i cross over the other side of the tracks to catch the 6 train?" i am dazed, confused, frightened, i want to cry, but i cannot, i am like in shock, i am in union sq, 14 street, how did i get here, i cannot remember anything,i am confused, but at the same time i feel i have been dragged back and forth in time. i feel my mind, 'here and there." i am supposed to be on the 4 train headed to brooklyn, i got on it, i saw it, i waited 13 minutes. 

now i am on union sq, 14 street, and i keep saying what happened how did i get here, tears welling, questions, i am light headed. i am confused, train sign says 9 minutes before the 4 train to brooklyn arrives. i wait i am confused i am frightened. how did this happen, i am not sure, something happened to me, i am on one side of the tracks, then i am on the 4 train to brooklyn but now i am headed to union sq. i called a mufon person contact, she said i may need medical attention. i made an appointment with a neurologist. but i think i, i, was taken. things have been happening in the last several years and now this.
content.summary: Possible abduction ?

content.detailedDescription: I observed what appeared to be a black balloon floating, but in the flight path that many aircraft fly routinly in the area. it struck me odd that previously a craft flew by with the lights on being that it was just before dusk. with the nakedgeye it apeared to be the size of a half carrot diamond, and had a steady, soundless track nw and smoothly turned west. i went into my home to get binos, (less than 30 sec.) and re-aquired the object still heading west. it was below cloud level and with the binos it was the size of a half of a dime, solid black, no lights, and at first glance looked like a oak leaf, and then the state of texas. i gave the binos to my wife and she said it looked more like triangle (she was sitting i was standing). that prompted us to do a google search on ufo sittings on found out the have been numerous sitting worldwide of simmilar objects in the last week. about ten minuts later, what appeared to be a passenger jet flew the same pattern, but with binos i did not see any passenger windows, followed by another simmilar jet a minute later. on the next day, at approximatley 5:30pm, two fighter jets flew over the similar flight path. i do reside about 50 miles north of homestead afb. but have never seen any jets over my house.
content.summary: Oak leaf / state of texas

content.detailedDescription: This is a test afkjasdljalkjflkjslkdfjlksjfj
content.summary: This is a test

content.detailedDescription:
On my way home from work (u. s. army mountain warfare school) i took the champlain island exit off i-87 onto route 2 to take a slow nice ride home, i pulled over to relieve myself; while in the process i for some reason looked up and there just above the treeline, to my total astonishment was this hugh object moving silently in a straight line above me.

i had always said to people that i would gladly be taken aboard a alien craft (because they obviously are highly intelligent) for  examination. but it just kept moving at a very slow speed, i watched it till it disappeared beyond the tree's.

the next day at work i wrote down in quite a bit of detail what i saw. i have it here i am just having a hard time finding the paper i wrote ....But i have it here somewhere.

this i am guessing was in the summer of 1996 or 1997. the date above in the questionare are merely a guess.

i have been thinking of that night alot lately and decided to hell with it i am going to send you my account.

no doubt in my mind what i saw and no one can change my mind. 

i was alone, which probably makes this report worthless to you folks.

i can't believe it was an experimental aircraft,and it was no aircraft i had ever seen before, not even close and i know what i saw.

i will continue to look for the paper i wrote about it, once found it will give me the date, and time of my sighting. 
i could (and did on the memo i wrote) draw a sketch of the craft i saw. 

thank you for your time in this, i am sure it will be of no use to you but i know what i saw.

retired military
content.summary: Round with a dome top white, blue and red/amber lights pulsating or swirling around the object, actually i think it was spinning but not at a high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription:
The witness trudy w. started by explaining that she has been going through a spiritual awakening in the last few months. she is becoming more aware of what���s going on in the world and to the belief of ufos. 
she was on her way to work in port huron from her home in sarnia april 2,2012 at 8:25 a.M. about a 2-3 minute drive. witness was sitting at the bluewater bridge waiting to go through customs and noticing a beautiful blue sky with small puffy clouds. she was thinking it would be a good to see a ufo. then she saw an object thinking at first it was a bird then she knew it wasn���t. the object was glistening in the sun. it was off the corner of the customs building then behind the building and then back into her line of vision. the object was round and thick not flat with violet and green lights pulsating underneath. seemed to be floating and drifting. she was trying to get her phone out of her purse and when she looked back up there were two. the second was a white orb. she wasn���t sure if it was smaller or farther away. she was next to go through the customs line even though she has a nexus allowing her tvero get through quicker she was disappointed the objects were gone when she got to the other side. she was very excited and couldn���t wait tot tell people. 
she feels great and uplifted since the sighting . she could not believe no one else saw them. even a customs agent sitting in his car appeared not to be aware of the objects.
trudy feels it was a personal event. this has added to her spiritual awakening and feels like she has awakened from a sleep.
trudy is a 61 year old mother of four and a nurse. at this time she is separated.
unknown uav
connie overy
content.summary: Lights and orb at bluewater bridge

content.detailedDescription:
I was  in my back yard viewing the night sky from my patio, it was a fairly clear night and had been star gazing for 30 minutes without anything unusual to note when a strange dark object caught my eye as it passed in front of the stars in the southern sky.
  
at first i thought it was something else, though i didn't know what it could be, maybe a flock of birds, a civilian or military aircraft.  most of the objects structure was visible as a black boomerang shape, with about 4-5 light blue-white lights along the bottom side of the wings, but there was something strange about it.  

there appeared to be a mist or a shadow all around it as it flew across the night sky towards the north. the object and it's lights were visible, but the effect of the "mist" surrounding it made me blink and strain to focus at what i was seeing even though the outline of the object was clear. 

i didn't have my binoculars and my  wife was inside, so i debated on staying to watch the object but i knew i didn't have much time before it would pass out of line-of-sight, blocked from view by surrounding houses. 

i ran through the house and grabbed my binoculars and yelled at my wife to come outside quickly as i ran out the front door.  i could not find the object again though.
content.summary: Black boomerang ufo with blue-white lights along wings, shrouded in mist

content.detailedDescription:
May 1, 2012: took a picture of backside of a house for sale. 
may 4, 2012 when reviewing photo of house noticed 2 white cloudish circles (a dozen? feet in diameter..Both the same size) above (hundreds of feet high) and beyond the house (hundreds of feet in front of the house).  the 2 circles were hundreds of feet apart. 
when the photo was taken, i did not notice the circles as i was focusing on the back of the house, not the sky.  i have no idea how long they were there or if they were still there when i left the scene.  when i saw the circles for the first time on the picture, i initially thought they were water stains or sun glare.  this was quickly ruled out as it was a very dry day with 10-20% cloud coverage; sun was to my left and above when photo was taken, not in front or low.
when i zoom in on the picture the circle on the left of the picture seems to be stationary. the right circle is slightly blurred appearing to show motion.  the one in motion (located on the right side of the picture) appears to be moving up and slightly to the right.
content.summary: Two small cloudish circles seen hundreds of feet above house.

content.detailedDescription: At like 9:35 i was outside on my back porch and i saw an object moving across the night sky, moving in an easternly direction, but desending. to me it looked like a cloud at first, but it had dim flashing lights i think, it was boomarang shape with a the point in direction of travel. i thought it was different and i had to tell someone about it. the object went below my line of sight, in a desending motion.
content.summary: At like 9:35 i was outside on my back porch and i saw an object moving across the night sky, moving in an easternly direction, but desending.

content.detailedDescription: Small glowing orb heading east,north-east just a few moments ago.
content.summary: Orb followed by three helicopters

content.detailedDescription: From st. anthony, looking toward columbia heights and fridley, i see a very bright light in the sky like a star. through binoculars it looks like a very bright white/yellow oval or sphere. it hovers. it moves slightly up and down and slightly back and forth, but mostly hovers. it has a halo or aura that is white as well. it can hang around for a half hour or an hour or more, and then it leaves, noticeably traveling north and west (getting smaller and smaller and staying close enough to horizon and tree line to not be able to see traveling away for long. i have seen this 4 times for sure and probably more. this has all been in 2012. it is usually late in the evening, between 10:00 and 12:30 for approximately an hour. even though i am looking towards columbia heights and fridley, what i am seeing could be as far away as brooklyn park for all i know. it could also be around a lot more often, i just don't look for it all the time and i'm not willing to stay up all night watching or looking for it. i have gotten my spouse out of bed to come look at it as well and he can verify that what i am describing here, he has seen as well. what made me first notice it, was i thought it was an unusually bright star...And then it moved. i don't feel any different when i see it or after it leaves. i lose sight because it leaves. i don't know what it is, but i do believe there is someone who does know what it is and why it is out there. it always seems to be in almost the same place in the sky from my vantage point, and it always goes the same direction more or less, when it leaves.
content.summary: Keep seeing bright glowing (white/yellowish) round/oval shape hovering in sky and then it leaves going north and west

content.detailedDescription:
Location: less than five miles from home at friends house.

last night and approx the same time four nights earlier, sounds of a single helicopter moving slowly over neighborhood brought us out to look.

in both cases helicopter following 1/2 mile or less behind very small glowing orb above the house line in a west to east then north east path.

slow, silent, non-erratic path.  no red or green indicator lights visable from side or aft on orb.  red starboard light on helicopter visable.

first night orb seemed to just vanish.

second time orb and helicopter went out of sight and earshot.

will try and keep video cam handy over the next week.
---
content.summary: Helicopter following small glowing orb

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my girlfriend were driving home from angola and we got about 10 miles from lagrange we both seen a very bright white light that was hovering about a mile above the ground . it was moving back and forth and the light would get brighter as it got closer and dimmer as it got farther away . there were no planes or anything else near this object. it lasted about an hour and it finally disapeared  into the sky. my girlfriend was
freaking out but i thought it was pretty neat .
content.summary: Very awesome to watch lots of movement and great lights .

content.detailedDescription: i was outside feeding the dogs and walking back toward the house to take out the trash when i looked behind me and in the northwestern sky was this extremely yellow bright light unlike any of the stars out. i then went around to the front of the house with the trash and my mother was standing in the driveway looking at a light in the eastern sky that was pulsating different colors. first white then red then white. i told her about the one behind the house in the northwestern sky so we watched both. both objects seemed to have airplanes or some flying craft in the vicinity either beside or above them. this isn't the first time we have seen stuff like this. the light in the western sky seemed to expand a bit in other words whereas at first it was just a big yellow light it was as if you could see that the light was widening. i am going to keep looking for this object to see if it went anywhere but i just had to file this first report because some strange lights are showing up in this area of ohio from time to time and i know i am not the only one seeing them.
content.summary: I saw three different lights as i was feeding the dogs and taking out the trash

content.detailedDescription:
My husband called me outside to look at the pending storm clouds coming in. (i'm a weather enthusiast--i love storms) i decided to shoot some pics with an olympus c-60 (just a pointnshoot, nothing fancy)

we didn't see or hear anything strange until i uploaded the photos to my pc.  neither my husband nor i saw or heard anything unusual at the time of the photo. one image had the above capture.  i inverted the photos  in photoshop cs5 and enlarged the area in question.

i have probably taken 5-10,000 photos with this camera and have never seen anything like this. i can identify camera malfunctions/glitches that would cause anomalies. the trail behind the object would indicate that there was motion and i believe the object may have been flying too fast to see with the naked eye.

this was captured in cambridge, on canada, may 3, 2012 at approximately 8pm

thanks,
content.summary: Still photo of ufo before evening storm

content.detailedDescription: I was checking out a new lens and didn't know i got the ufo on film till i uplosded it to my pc i added the video check it out.,
content.shape: Blimp,   Disc,   Egg,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: I was checking out a new lens and didn't know i got the ufo on film till i uplosded it to my pc

content.detailedDescription: Took pics.4 lights
content.summary: Lights l

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on our back porch with my husband as we let the dogs out one last time before bed.  i was looking up facing east when i noticed a bright orange ball/sphere looking object moving from south to north at about the same height as an airplane would fly, but traveling faster than an airplane.  it had no blinking lights, and no other colored lights.  it was just bright solid orange.  it moved in a straight line with no sound coming from it.  i pointed it out to my husband and we both watched it till it disappeared behind some trees.  i ran through the house to the front porch hoping to see it again, but it was gone. approximately 90 seconds long.
content.summary: 1 bright orange sphere/orb moving across sky south to north

content.detailedDescription: This is a shout to the gent in arlington, vt. over the years, it has occurred to me that whenever i look for 'them' i see them. have had two sitings like yours in this area (st. albans) and one not too far from your siting. it's a wondrous thing. the reason i logged on today was an experience that i had last night--for reasons of brevity---will not go into now but i wanted to see who was in the neighborhood last night and bingo--there's your siting. i'm not saying our experiences were related but i'm here to tell you dude---you ain't alone---we ain't alone. the pisser about this is---it makes some people very nervous. it threatens their well ordered world. some people can't see beyond their own noses. it upsets the judeo-christian concept of things. i base all of my present belief system on one incontrovertible fact---space is infinite. no wall with a sign that says, "the end." the question here is can the human mind truly grasp what infinity is? i'm not tethered to this universe and now neither are you. there's so much juicy food for thought here. go with it. and, right on, my brother.
content.summary: Have seen same as the sunderland/arlinjgton siting

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on beckley blvd when i noticed a large passenger plane above.  i then noticed that there were no wings and suddenly the object disappeared from my view.
1:10 pm  clear skies
south dallas
cilinder in shape.
content.summary: Looked like a large passenger plane without wings.

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading east on w. thunderbird rd. approaching a red light at 35th ave around 12:15pm local time on 4/27/2010. as i approached the light i noticed an object at about 40 degrees elevation that was rapidly approaching and dropping in altitude heading in a westerly direction along thunderbird rd. the most notable feature was the cycling color shifts from white to grey and back to white. during the actual observation this appeared to be a single object possibly 5 to 15 feet across. the second most notable feature was the apparent intelligent movement. the object approached rapidly, then stopped and hovered at what i would estimate to be around 200 ft. altitude, and 100 to 200 feet away from my location as i was stopped at the red traffic light.

i was surprised at this object hovering right in front of my lane of traffic, and i looked around to see if other drivers were noticing the same object nearby. as i was pulling out my phone to take a photo i noticed the driver in the truck to my left seemed to be watching the same event. i could not find the object on my phone screen, so i just snapped a couple of shots hoping to be able to capture something.

the object hovered for approx. 20 seconds as i sat in amazement watching the color shift back and forth from white to grey, and back again about every half second. i was observing the object from between power lines at this point, so i was able to see that the object stayed completely locked in position and motionless during its hover, except for the color shifts. i got the impression that the object was making observations of some kind just by the way it froze in position for a time.

after about 20 seconds the object set off for the north/north-east at a very rapid pace. it seemed again to be moving under intelligent control, but it didn't look like any kind of remote control vehicle i can think of, and the distances covered during its approach and exit would rule out any kind of toy remote control vehicle. no sign of any exhaust or trail were observed.

after i saw this i began searching the internet for similar sightings. around this time there was a rash of sightings of what were described as "silver orbs" around this part of town and to the north around the 101 freeway and 35th ave. there were also several orb sightings around south mountain during the surrounding month or so.

i went back to look at the photos i took with my droid eris phone (poor quality), and at first thought that i had not captured anything. i did discover, however, that i did catch it in the right corner of one of my frames. i also discovered from the photo that the object was not a singular triangle-shaped object, but was rather 3 visible "orbs" forming a triangle. it seems that the color shift was due to individual orbs flipping from white to a grey color in a repeating pattern. i am uploading the original photo as taken with my phone, along with the same photo with some enhancements and notes. i'm also including an animated false-color gif file that helps to see the three distinct orbs.

i would like to have contact with others who have had daytime sightings of close-up orbs or objects in the phoenix area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small fast-moving triangular object with three visible points that alternated white/grey.
